title: How to write a letter to my school demanding why my result is not yet out - Quora

response.answer_text: Date Your name Dear Sir/Madame I took my exams on date_x; however, as of today, I haven’t received yet my results. It is important that a copy of my results is sent to Y because [add your reason here]. I would appreciate it if my results are published as soon as possible so that I don’t lose the opportunity to [add your reason here]. Sincerely, Your name
